alt: The player stands in a room with black granite flooring and dark green walls, decorated sparsely with golden furniture.
description: Your grandfather's manse is an imposing space.
title: The Manse

alt: The player stands in a cave, surrounded by dusty grey rocks. A muddy stream flows beside them.
description: Dig your way through the mines, finding ores and precious gemstones.
title: Mines

alt: The player stands in a forest, surrounded by lush bushes and flowering trees.
description: Navigate the fae forests and come home with material wood and other delights.
title: Forest

alt: The player stands in the street, between a general store with a gaudy sign and a quiet park.
description: Spend time in the Town, filled with locals and shops.
title: Town

alt: Lazarus, a man with grey skin and black hair wearing a leather jacket, speaks to the player in a crumbling graveyard by the cliffside: Well, I'm not the boss of you. Come around any time you like.
description: Lazarus, a prickly lone wolf crashing on the edge of town, takes a while to warm up to new people.
title: Lazarus

alt: Sparrow, a woman with ochre skin and fluffy aqua hair wearing a pink cardigan, approaches the player in a forest full of yellow leaves and red flowers, saying: To break the misdirection spell, you'll have to find the magic circles.
description: Sparrow, the witch's daughter, is a shy soul who could use a friend.
title: Sparrow

alt: Petya, a man with long strawberry brown hair and fair skin wearing a periwinkle sweater, approaches the player in the autumn town of Hallowed Crossing, saying: Not just a Keymaster Reaper, responsible for one of the twelve Gates to the afterworld, but also a leading researcher in the field of magic and auras.
description: Petya, a geeky aspiring author, is eager to get to know you.
title: Petya

alt: The player stands in a field with several types of crops growing. The Grid Info popup labels the plant they're facing as tea. The land around the field is covered in green grass and surrounded by thick thorny vines.
description: The Rose Garden is the thorny ruins of a breath-taking greenhouse.
title: Rose Garden

alt: The crafting menu displays recipes for several other crafting stations, including a Drying Rack, a Cauldron, and a Jarring Station. One dark unlearned recipe is labelled Kitchenette.
description: Craft everything you need: from tools to work the land, to food with a wide variety of effects, to furniture to make the space your own.
title: Crafting

alt: The player waters a growing mango plant, one of several crops planted in the field. Surrounding the field are palm trees and monstera bushes.
description: The Tropical Retreat is a summery paradise.
title: Tropical Retreat

alt: The player inspects a prickly pear plant in a field surrounded by tumbleweeds and cacti.
description: The Succulent Sanctuary is an arid landscape filled with cacti.
title: Succulent Sanctuary

alt: In a map dotted with maple trees and surrounded by brambles, Viryn says to the player: So it's true then. He's gone.
description: Your grandfather's butler, Viryn, is hesitant to let you in.
title: Viryn
